sections.heading: GENERAL REFUND POLICY
sections.body:
```markdown
## Refund Policy Summary

- **No Refund Policy**: Cyberize Group maintains a strict no refund policy for all Products and Services unless otherwise stated in writing.
- **Acceptance of Terms**: By using this website, you acknowledge and accept these terms, forfeiting the right to claim any refunds for fees paid.

For further inquiries, please contact our support team.
```

sections.heading: WEBSITE CANCELLATION POLICY
sections.body:
```markdown
## Termination Policy Summary

- **Client Termination Rights**: The client can terminate any or all outstanding work with immediate effect upon written notice.
  
- **Post-Termination Process**:
  - Cyberize Group will inform the client of the completed performance extent.
  - Deliverables will be made available for download via a Google Drive folder.
  - The client has **30 days** to download the work before access is revoked and the folder is deleted.

- **Fees Upon Discontinuation**:
  - A **25% administrative/project management fee** will be charged, or the current hourly billable rate (whichever is higher).
  - If no hourly rates are disclosed, the default rate is **$150 per hour**.
  - The 25% fee applies to the entire project budget.

### Call to Action
For any questions or to initiate termination, please contact Cyberize Group directly.
```

sections.heading: WEBSITE REFUND POLICY
sections.body:
```markdown
## Project Termination Policy

- **Immediate Discontinuation**: Upon client notice of project termination, Cyberize Group will cease all work immediately.
  
- **Fees**:
  - A **25% administrative/project management fee** will be charged based on the total project budget or the current hourly billable rate, whichever is greater.
  - If no hourly rates are disclosed, the default rate is **$150 per hour**.
  
- **Client Deliverables**: All claims to work and deliverables will be forfeited upon request for a refund.

- **Refund Eligibility**: Clients are not eligible for a refund if they abandon the project for **two (2) or more weeks**.

---

**Last Updated**: February 16, 2018  
**Today**: May 17, 2025

## Contact Information
- **Address**: 3110 Hatton St, Sarasota, FL
- **Phone**: [(800) 983-0668](tel:+18009830668)
- ![Google Maps Preview](https://privacy-proxy-server.usercentrics.eu/googleMaps?center=NaN,NaN&size=1000x500&zoom=12)
```

sections.heading: This third party embed for Google Maps is being blocked

## Summary

To load the Google Maps service, your consent is required. Please click 'Accept' to enable this third-party feature. 

### Important Note
This service cannot load due to undisclosed trackers. The website owner must:
- Add this third-party service to their Cookie Policy and Consent Tool questionnaire in their Termageddon account.
- Click 'Submit' after adding the service to allow it to load based on user consent.
